Comments_List: German grammar and conversation and culture.

My German skills in terms of speaking, reading, writing, and cultural understanding were all greatly improved over the course of the semester, and I especially became much more comfortable speaking in German.
I gained a better understanding of the German language. I learned more about German culture.
Builds a good foundation of German language
Builds a good foundation of German language
Very well taught course overall. Not many weaknesses.

The course being everyday helped facilitate immersion into the language, as well as quicker improvement. I believe that the course was a good mixture of speaking, grammar, and culture, and that it was also strong in terms of the diversity of coursework (written exercises, speaking tasks, planning and acting out skits, listening to music, watching movies, etc.). Professor Stockloev was also a huge help and made the class very enjoyable.
Great Language to learn so I would recommend.
Yes, I would definitely recommend this course to any student interested in learning German.
I recommend this class to students interested in learning German.
